name: Neural Network Tower Defense
description:
ENGLISH

Small tower defense to test neural networks in video games. The point of the game is that the enemy is not a conventional AI, but a neural network. It currently has three levels of difficulty and 6 types of actions to perform.

The neural network has been developed with Unity ml-agents.

-----------------------------------------------------------

ESPAÑOL

Pequeño tower defense para probar las redes neuronales en videojuegos. La gracia del juego es que el enemigo no es una IA convencional, sino una red neuronal. Actualmente tiene tres niveles de dificultad y 6 tipos de acciones a realizar.

La red neuronal ha sido desarrollada con ml-agents de Unity.

-----------------------------------------------------------

Sprites Assets:
